title: Frontier in Motion

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: The frontier is in motion, alwaysâ€”because the thing it's fencing in is not a static 'you,' but a process, an improvisation with a long backstory.
dialogue.context: The AI explains how personal boundaries must move because identity itself is process, not thing

scene_context: Against the surreal image of the Great Wall of China riding an ocean wave, the Architect explains the dynamic nature of consciousness boundaries.
philosophical_theme: Identity as process rather than fixed entity, requiring mobile boundaries
visual_elements: The Great Wall of China surfing on a massive ocean wave
